description: As you probably well know, Cody Cummings loves his fans.  And the fans love him back!  Today he's showing off a few gifts that were sent to him with love and adoration, while giving thanks in his own way.Join Cody as he tells you why this pair of shoes means so much, what his plans are for the jersey, and how awesome his new football poster is.  Then he's getting much more comfortable, pulling out his fattening dick and tugging it slowly to start.  Then he's putting on his new gear, lying on the couch and continuing to pleasure himself by stroking that huge, thick meat.  And he's doing it out of appreciation for you and the rest of his loyal fans.  Enjoy!
title: Special Thanks
